name: .223 AK74 10 rd magazine
description: A AK74 style magazine designed for .223 ammuntion, made of steel-reinforced polymer.  Holds 10 rounds.

name: .223 AK74 30 rd magazine
description: A AK74 style magazine designed for .223 ammuntion, made of steel-reinforced polymer.  Holds 30 rounds.

name: .223 Galil 35 rd magazine
description: A AK74 style magazine designed for .223 ammuntion, made of steel-reinforced polymer.  Holds 30 rounds.

name: .300 tactical magazine
description: A 4-round box magazine typically used by sniper rifles
//: Capacity should be 4 but I added one to represent one in the chamber.
See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Beta_C-Mag.  The removal of caliber conversion kits from coregame broke this;  see https://github.com/CleverRaven/Cataclysm-DDA/pull/23078 .
name: .308 Beta-C dual drum magazine
description: A 100 round magazine for assault rifles that utilize the .308 round or similar ammunition.

name: .308 Steyr 5 rd magazine
description: A Steyr, 5 rd, rotary magazine, made for .308 ammuntion, with a transparent back.
//: Capacity should be 5 but I added one to represent one in the chamber.

name: .308 Steyr 10 rd magazine
description: A Steyr, 5 rd, staggered magazine, made for .308 ammuntion, with a transparent back.
//: Capacity should be 10 but I added one to represent one in the chamber.

name: Translucent STANAG magazine
description: A 30 round STANAG-compliant magazine for rifles that utilize .223 or 5.56x45mm ammunition.

name: .223 Beta-C dual drum magazine
description: A 100 round STANAG-compliant magazine for assault rifles that utilize the .233 round or similar ammunition.

name: .308 X-14 50 rd drum magazine
description: A 50 round drum magazine designed for .308 ammuntion, made of steel-reinforced polymer.  Compatible with M1A and M14 rifles.
